exceptions.tactic: intros worlds R po_R J H.
intros worlds' R po_R J H.
intros worlds' R' po_R J H.
intros worlds' R' po_R' J H.
intros worlds' R' po_R' J' H.

exceptions.exn: Cannot coerce ResidualSeparationAlgebra to an evaluable reference.

original: intros worlds R po_R J H. unfold ResidualSeparationAlgebra. intros USA. unfold UnitalSeparationAlgebra in USA. destruct USA as [residue_exists incr_exists]. apply Build_ResidualSeparationAlgebra. intros n. destruct (residue_exists n) as [m Hres]. exists m. apply Hres.
